activities: NorthgateArinso, Inc. is a HR benefits and payroll provider, and is processing personal information for its client's and its own employees.   Authorized NorthgateArinso's employees have access to such personal information in order to provide HR administration, benefits inquiries and/or payroll services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Employees and Customer's employee's data, including (will vary by customer contract) Employee ID, Name, Home Address, Tax Identifiers, Compensation, Job information, Date of Hire/termination, Leave Status.  Information received from employee at call center is entered manually.
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
